body:
The API you are referring to is template.formats (not template.format, that is an internal construct), introduced by Yehuda. The original commit is gone but a blog post mentions it: http://yehudakatz.com/2009/01/03/todays-dispatch-weaning-actionview-off-of-content-negotiation/

I am still trying to wrap my head around this. It seems the AbstractController will set this array, but of this array only the first format is actually used. See actionpack/lib/action_view/template.rb:151-158. So for now the solution seems to be to inspect the first format, via the type method, and don't escape when this is text/plain.

For most parts I am assuming things, so any input is appreciated. I will work on a patch later today.
